message: Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to acquire a product that's worth a lot to you.  I know you've been looking for something like this, and I'm confident this will exceed your expectations.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. This is a great deal for both of us â€“ you get a valuable product at a fair price, and I get a good return on my investment.  Let me know what you think!
